long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time and effort when collaborating on web pages, with SimpleSync you can add comments on any website UIs and share it with your teammates.

Create rooms (1 room = 1 website), and sessions (1 session = 1 page) and start adding Figma's like comments on live websites.

Share the room id with your team or clients for them to see the comments straight on their page, making feedbacks highly contextual.

Once the feedback has been addressed just mark it as resolved and it will not show on the page.

On SimpleSync website you can see all your projects in one place and manage all your data.
